sqlTemplates.sql: WITH pr_metrics AS (             SELECT date_trunc('month', created_at)::DATE as month,                    COUNT(*) as total_prs,                    CAST(AVG(EPOCH_MS (closed_at - created_at) / 3600000.0) AS INTEGER) AS avg_hours_to_close,                    COUNT(                    CASE                              WHEN closed = true THEN 1                    END                    ) as closed_prs,                    COUNT(                    CASE                              WHEN closed = false THEN 1                    END                    ) as open_prs               FROM dlthub_reactions_20241111084203.pull_requests              WHERE created_at >= current_date - INTERVAL '6 months'           GROUP BY date_trunc('month', created_at)           ORDER BY month          )   SELECT month,          total_prs,          avg_hours_to_close,          closed_prs,          open_prs,          CAST(((closed_prs / total_prs) * 100.0) AS INTEGER) AS closure_rate     FROM pr_metrics
